Source code for comet.utilities.parser.config_parser

from typing import *
from copy import deepcopy
from comet.domain.ontology import Ontology
from comet.domain.domain import Domain
from comet.utilities import utility as utils
from comet.utilities import constants
from comet.lib import load_module, adjust_file_path
import logging
from comet.lib import logger

_logger = logger.get_logger(__name__)
AUTO_PARAM = "auto"



[docs]def update_parser_configuration(configuration: Dict) -> Dict:
    """
    Apply all field in the config into class based, add args for all components
    Args:
        configuration (Dict): the global configuration

    Returns:

    """
    # This will update package if module only provide class name
    _update_packages(configuration)

    # This convert ontology, datbaase, domain to instance
    convert_domains_to_instance(configuration)

    # This add args for each component
    add_arguments(configuration)

    return configuration




[docs]def convert_domains_to_instance(configuration: Dict) -> None:
    """
    Apply ontology, domain, database into class based

    Args:
        configuration (Dict): the global configuration

    Returns: Dict

    """
    if 'data' in configuration['GENERAL']:
        # Load database
        if 'database' in configuration['GENERAL']['data']:
            db_config = configuration['GENERAL']['data']['database']
            args = db_config.get('arguments') if "arguments" in db_config else {}
            if "db_path" in args:
                args['db_path'] = adjust_file_path(args['db_path'])
            database = load_module(db_config["package"],
                                   db_config["class"],
                                   args)
            _logger.info(f"init {db_config['class']} with: {db_config['arguments']}")
        else:
            raise ValueError(f"Database info is not provided in file config")

        # Load ontology
        if 'ontology' in configuration['GENERAL']['data']:
            ontology_path = adjust_file_path(configuration['GENERAL']['data']['ontology'])
            ontology = Ontology.from_path(ontology_path)
            _logger.info(f"ontology path: {ontology_path}")
        else:
            raise ValueError(f"Ontology info is not provided in file config")

        # Load domain
        if 'domain' in configuration['GENERAL']['data']:
            domain_path = adjust_file_path(configuration['GENERAL']['data']['domain'])
            domain = Domain.from_path(domain_path)
            _logger.info(f"domain path: {domain_path}")
        else:
            raise ValueError(f"Ontology info is not provided in file config")
    else:
        raise ValueError("Data field need to provide in file config")
    configuration['GENERAL']['data']['ontology'] = ontology
    configuration['GENERAL']['data']['domain'] = domain
    configuration['GENERAL']['data']['database'] = database




[docs]def add_arguments(configuration: Dict) -> Dict:
    """
    This function add all argsuments necessary for each component like: dialogue state, dialogue manager, policy,
    user simulator, ect ..

    Args:
        configuration (Dict): A config

    Returns: The config added arguments for all components

    """
    add_arguments_agent(configuration)
    add_arguments_user_simulator(configuration)
    return configuration




[docs]def add_arguments_agent(configuration: Dict) -> None:
    """
    Add the arguments configure for the agent: DS, DST, POLICY, DM, NLD, NLU

    Args:
        configuration (Dict): Global configure

    Returns: Update directly to configuration

    """
    if 'NLG' in configuration['AGENT']:
        nlg_module = configuration['AGENT']['NLG']
        arguments = nlg_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_nlg(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['AGENT']['NLG']['arguments'] = args

    if 'NLU' in configuration['AGENT']:
        nlu_module = configuration['AGENT']['NLU']
        arguments = nlu_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_nlu(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['AGENT']['NLU']['arguments'] = args

    if 'DS' in configuration['AGENT']:
        ds_module = configuration['AGENT']['DS']
        arguments = ds_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_dialogue_state(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['AGENT']['DS']['arguments'] = args

    if 'SF' in configuration['AGENT']:
        df_module = configuration['AGENT']['SF']
        arguments = df_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_state_featurizer(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['AGENT']['SF']['arguments'] = args

    if 'DST' in configuration['AGENT']:
        dst_module = configuration['AGENT']['DST']
        arguments = dst_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_dialogue_state_tracker(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['AGENT']['DST']['arguments'] = args
    if 'SynonymMapper' in configuration['AGENT']:
        dst_module = configuration['AGENT']['SynonymMapper']
        arguments = dst_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_synonym_mapper(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['AGENT']['SynonymMapper']['arguments'] = args
    # add DM arguments
    if "DM" in configuration['AGENT']:
        dm_module = configuration['AGENT']['DM']
        arguments = dm_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_dialogue_manager(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['AGENT']['DM']['arguments'] = args
    if "WP" in configuration['AGENT']:
        wp_module = configuration['AGENT']['WP']
        arguments = wp_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_policy(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['AGENT']['WP']['arguments'] = args
    if "CV" in configuration['AGENT']:
        cv_module = configuration['AGENT']['CV']
        arguments = cv_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_cv(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['AGENT']['CV']['arguments'] = args
    if 'POLICY' in configuration['AGENT']:
        for sub_policy in configuration['AGENT']["POLICY"].keys():
            if sub_policy == 'policy_path':
                continue
            policy_module = configuration['AGENT']["POLICY"][sub_policy]
            arguments = policy_module.get('arguments')
            args = args_for_policy(configuration, arguments)
            configuration['AGENT']["POLICY"][sub_policy]['arguments'] = args




[docs]def add_arguments_user_simulator(configuration):
    """
        Add the arguments configure for the user simulator: US, NLG, NLU

        Args:
            configuration (Dict): Global configure

        Returns: Update directly to configuration

        """
    if 'USER_SIMULATOR' not in configuration:
        return
    if 'NLG' in configuration['USER_SIMULATOR']["arguments"]:
        nlg_module = configuration['USER_SIMULATOR']["arguments"]['NLG']
        arguments = nlg_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_nlg(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['USER_SIMULATOR']["arguments"]['NLG']['arguments'] = args

    if 'NLU' in configuration['USER_SIMULATOR']["arguments"]:
        nlu_module = configuration['USER_SIMULATOR']["arguments"]['NLU']
        arguments = nlu_module.get('arguments')
        args = args_for_nlu(configuration, arguments)
        configuration['USER_SIMULATOR']["arguments"]['NLU']['arguments'] = args
    if "ontology" not in configuration['USER_SIMULATOR']["arguments"]:
        configuration['USER_SIMULATOR']["arguments"]['ontology'] = \
            configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("ontology")
    if "database" not in configuration['USER_SIMULATOR']["arguments"]:
        configuration['USER_SIMULATOR']["arguments"]['database'] = \
            configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("database")




[docs]def args_for_dialogue_manager(configuration: Dict, current_args: Dict = None) -> Dict:
    """
    Get the arguments to init for dialogue manager module
    The defaults arguments for each nlu components is: configuration, ontology, database, domain,
    DS.

    Args:
        configuration (Dict): The global configuration
        current_args (Dict): The current args from configuration

    Returns (Dict): The args for init DM

    """
    args = current_args if current_args else {}
    args.update({
        'configuration': configuration,
        'ontology': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("ontology"),
        'database': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("database"),
        'domain': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("domain"),
    })

    if 'DS' not in args:
        args.update({
            'DS': configuration['AGENT'].get('DS')
        })
    args = _update_auto_param(args, configuration)
    return args




[docs]def args_for_dialogue_state(configuration: Dict, current_args: Dict = None) -> Dict:
    """
    Get the arguments to init for dialogue state module
    The defaults arguments for each nlu components is: ontology

    Args:
        configuration (Dict): The global configuration
        current_args (Dict): The current_args configuration.

    Returns: The args for init DS

    """
    # args = current_args if current_args else {}
    # args.update({
    #     'ontology': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("ontology")
    # })
    # args = _update_auto_param(args, configuration)
    # return args
    return {}




[docs]def args_for_state_featurizer(configuration: Dict, current_args: Dict = None) -> Dict:
    """
    Get the arguments to init for dialogue state featurizer module
    The defaults arguments for each nlu components is: ontology

    Args:
        configuration (Dict): The global configuration
        current_args (Dict): The current_args configuration.

    Returns: The args for init DS

    """
    args = current_args if current_args else {}
    args.update({
        'ontology': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("ontology"),
        'domain': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("domain")
    })
    args = _update_auto_param(args, configuration)
    return args




[docs]def args_for_dialogue_state_tracker(configuration: Dict, current_args: Dict = None) -> Dict:
    """
    Get the arguments to init for dialogue state tracker module
    The defaults arguments for each nlu components is: ontology, database, domain, DS

    Args:
        class_name (Text): Name class of DM module
        configuration (Dict): The global configuration
        current_args (Dict): The current_args configuration.

    Returns: The args for init DST

    """
    args = current_args if current_args else {}
    args.update({
        'ontology': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("ontology"),
        'database': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("database"),
        'domain': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("domain"),
    })
    if 'DS' not in args:
        args.update({
            'DS': deepcopy(configuration['AGENT'].get('DS'))
        })
    args = _update_auto_param(args, configuration)
    return args




[docs]def args_for_synonym_mapper(configuration: Dict, current_args: Dict = None) -> Dict:
    args = current_args if current_args else {}
    args = _update_auto_param(args, configuration)
    return args




[docs]def args_for_nlu(configuration: Dict, current_args: Dict = None) -> Dict:
    """
    Get the arguments to init for nlu module.
    The defaults arguments for each nlu components is: ontology, database

    Args:
        configuration (Dict): The global configuration
        current_args (Dict): The current_args configuration.

    Returns: The args for init NLU

    """

    args = current_args if current_args else {}
    args.update({
        'ontology': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("ontology"),
        'database': configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get("database"),
    })
    if 'models_path' in configuration['GENERAL']:
        args.update({
            'base_models_dir': configuration['GENERAL'].get('models_path')
        })
    args = _update_auto_param(args, configuration)
    return args




[docs]def args_for_nlg(configuration: Dict, current_args: Dict = None) -> Dict:
    """
    Get the arguments to init for nlg module.
    The defaults arguments for each policy components is: Nothing

    Args:
        configuration (Dict): The global configuration. May be need in the future
        current_args (Dict): The current_args configuration.

    Returns: The args for init NLG

    """
    args = current_args if current_args else {}
    args = _update_auto_param(args, configuration)
    return args




[docs]def args_for_policy(configuration: Dict, current_args: Dict = None) -> Dict:
    """
    Get the arguments to init for policy module.
    The defaults arguments for each policy components is: ontology, database, domain

    Args:
        configuration (Dict): The global configuration.
        current_args (Dict): The current_args configuration.

    Returns: The args for init Policy

    """
    args = current_args if current_args else {}
    if "SF" not in args:
        args['SF'] = configuration['AGENT'].get("SF")
    else:
        cur_args = args['SF'].get('arguments', {})
        sf_args = args_for_state_featurizer(configuration, cur_args)
        sf_args = _update_auto_param(sf_args, configuration)
        args['SF']['arguments'] = sf_args
    if "WP" not in args:
        args['WP'] = configuration['AGENT'].get("WP")
    args = _update_auto_param(args, configuration)
    return args




[docs]def args_for_cv(configuration: Dict, current_args: Dict = None) -> Dict:
    """
    Get the arguments to init for policy module.
    The defaults arguments for each policy components is: ontology, database, domain

    Args:
        configuration (Dict): The global configuration.
        current_args (Dict): The current_args configuration.

    Returns: The args for init Policy

    """
    args = current_args if current_args else {}
    args = _update_auto_param(args, configuration)
    return args



def _update_auto_param(arguments: Dict, configuration: Dict):
    """
    If the value of arguments is global. We will change its value based configuration

    Args:
        arguments:
        configuration:

    Returns:

    """
    for param, value in arguments.items():
        if value == AUTO_PARAM:
            arguments[param] = _get_auto_param(param, configuration)
    return arguments


def _get_auto_param(name: Text, configuration: Dict) -> Dict:
    if name == "SF":
        global_config = configuration['AGENT'].get(name)
    elif name == "DS":
        global_config = configuration['AGENT'].get(name)
    elif name == "DST":
        global_config = configuration['AGENT'].get(name)
    elif name == "ontology":
        global_config = configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get(name)
    elif name == "database":
        global_config = configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get(name)
    elif name == "domain":
        global_config = configuration['GENERAL']['data'].get(name)
    elif name == "NLU":
        global_config = configuration['AGENT'].get(name)
    elif name == "NLG":
        global_config = configuration['AGENT'].get(name)
    elif name == "WP":
        global_config = configuration['AGENT'].get(name)
    elif name == "SynonymMapper":
        global_config = configuration['AGENT'].get(name)
    elif name in ["WUS", "USER_SIMULATOR"]:
        global_config = configuration.get("USER_SIMULATOR")
    else:
        raise ValueError(f"No support lobal name: {name}")
    return global_config


def _update_packages(nested_dictionary):
    for key, value in nested_dictionary.items():
        if isinstance(value, dict):
            if "class" in value.keys() and "package" not in value.keys():
                value = utils.auto_fill_package_module(type_com=key, config_module=value)
            _update_packages(value)
